channel.title: Semiconductors on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Semiconductors on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Trump caving on Nvidia H20 export curbs may disrupt his bigger trade war
item.description: China’s frontier AI will be fueled by Nvidia H20 chips, experts warn Trump.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: Chinese firms rush for Nvidia chips as US prepares to lift ban
item.description: H20 chips, designed to skirt export bans, are back after Trump meets with CEO.
